title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1475/94 of 27 June 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1475/94 of 27 June 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 246, 5. 11. 1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 303, 10. 12. 1993, p. 9.
(3) OJ No L 161, 23. 6. 1976, p. 10.
(4) OJ No L 159, 1. 7. 1993, p. 104.
